abstract: H.P. is following the lead of Dell by purchasing a storage software firm that complements virtualization technology.
snippet: H.P. is following the lead of Dell by purchasing a storage software firm that complements virtualization technology.
lead_paragraph: The rise of virtualization software made by companies like VMware and Microsoft has forced hardware companies into drastic action.

headline.main: H.P. Shakes Out $360 Million for LeftHand Networks

abstract: Amazon’s cloud is growing up as it welcomes Microsoft’s software and casts an eye toward bigger customers.
snippet: Amazon’s cloud is growing up as it welcomes Microsoft’s software and casts an eye toward bigger customers.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com’s computer-rental service seems to have made its way from infancy to adolescence in a smooth fashion.

headline.main: Amazon Invites Microsoft to Sit on Its Cloud
